page.title: 07Plympton Lamb Feast
page.content: {Elizabeth 1st }granted a charter for a weekly market. The market was on Saturday. There were two fairs held each year. One of the fairs took place on the {Eve of the Ascension }the other was on the {Feast of the Blessed {Virgin Mary. { }We have a {Lamb Feast }every year. This year it was on the 29th June. The Lamb Feast is organised by the { {Plympton St Maurice Civic Association. At the Lamb Feast they cook a whole lamb. Our school {(Plympton St Maurice {Primary School) }has several stalls at the Lamb Feast each year. We usually have "Spin the Wheel". We take part so we can raise money for the school. This year we raised Â£95 that will be spent on things for the school. Dianne Hobbs and Katie Yeoman Aged 10
